allow: Bash(awk '{sum+=$1; if($1<100) thin++; if($1>100) good++} END {print """"Avg lines:"""", sum/NR, """"Thin (<100 lines):"""", thin, """"Good (>100 lines):"""", good}')

Bash(python -c "import sys; import json; packages = [''Flask'', ''yfinance'', ''requests'', ''numpy'', ''pandas'']; versions = {}; [versions.update({p: __import__(p).__version__}) for p in packages if hasattr(__import__(p), ''__version__'')]; print(json.dumps(versions, indent=2))")

Bash(awk '{sum+=$1; count++; if($1<100) thin++; if($1>400) rich++} END {print """"Total posts:"""", count, """"
Avg lines:"""", int(sum/count), """"
Thin content (<100):"""", thin+0, """"
Rich content (>400):"""", rich+0}')
Bash(awk -F: '{sum+=$2; count++; if($2==0) zero++; if($2>5) good++} END {print """"Avg internal links:"""", sum/count, """"\nPosts with 0 links:"""", zero+0, """"\nPosts with 5+ links:"""", good+0}')
